title: Financial Data Exploration
text:
The goal of this website is to explore data sets related to philanthropic spending efforts towards environmental and social justice causes.
The findings on this platform are a work in progress. Suggestions are welcome.

title: Financial Data Exploration
text:
Project Objectives
This project aims to:

Scope a range of philanthropic giving data sources, including online databases and public records.
Discern trends and patterns in spending towards environmental and social justice.
Compile information for the development of an environmental and climate justice dashboard.’

title: Financial Data Exploration
text:
Website Structure

Financial Statement Data Sets

Multiple pages documenting important fields in corporate financial reports and potential significance for dashboard.

title: 2024 Q1 Submission Data Report
text: This document aims to perform an initial exploration of the features and values within the Securities and Exchange Committee’s Financial Statement Submissions to pinpoint variables for assessing philanthropic giving in the environmental and social justice sectors.

title: 2024 Q1 Submission Data Report
